content.prompt: Which of the following statements about interest groups would the author most likely agree with?

choices.label: Interest groups play the important function of including more people in elections.
Interest groups undermine stability by creating too much conflict and polarization in politics.
Interest groups tend to over-represent elite interests.
Interest groups have less power in American government than political parties have.
